text: Eustace Crawley (19 April 1868 - 2 November 1914) was an English cricketer. He played seventeen first-class matches for Cambridge University Cricket Club between 1887 and 1889. He was educated at Harrow School.Wisden Cricketer's Almanack 1916, "Obituaries in 1915" He was killed by a shell during World War I. ==See also== * List of Cambridge University Cricket Club players ==References== ==External links== * Category:1868 births Category:1914 deaths Category:British Army personnel of World War I Category:British military personnel killed in World War I Category:People educated at Harrow School Category:English cricketers Category:Cambridge University cricketers Category:People from Highgate Category:12th Royal Lancers officers
title: Eustace Crawley
